summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5718 for the improvement of West Ray Street, (South Side) from 7th Avenue West to 5th Avenue West; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75538, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
